name: Iansan
title: "Tempered in Molten Stone" Iansan
desc: Early to bed, early to rise. Avoid anything high in sugar or sodium.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Iansan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Thunderbolt Rush
skills.desc: Deals ? ?, enters Nightsoul's Blessing, gains 1 Nightsoul point, and creates 1 stack of Agile Switch.

skills.name: The Three Principles of Power
skills.desc: Deals ? ?, enters Nightsoul's Blessing, gains 1 Nightsoul point, and creates Kinetic Energy Scale.

skills.name: Caloric Balancing Plan
skills.desc: (Passive) While this character is in Nightsoul's Blessing, after your character performs Prepare Skill or switches 2 times, if their Nightsoul points are 2, then heal the most damaged character on your side for 1 HP. Otherwise, gain 1 Nightsoul point. (3 times per Round)
